attributes.additional_details: To STOP this travesty of justice for all working class families, or single people that have brought up families in their 'homes'..IF there was adequate housing for single people I'm sure a lot would be happier to move and let families with children move in.BUT there isn't, so where are we expected to move to.??? In a lot of cases these houses have been our 'homes' for 25+ yrs where our children were brought up an now our grandchildren come to stay..'Homes' that we have maintained, looked after, gardens tended and cared for, memories made..and now we are expected to pay more rent out of the ever decreasing benefit that we get..FOR WHAT.?? Someone to come from overseas an move in.? WE NEED TO FIGHT THIS...SIGN PLEASE...
